Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data

The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataManager
    The main class for dealing with I/O operations, including i18n.
    DeckDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of a deck from the DataManager
    EffectDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of an effect card from the DataManager
    FighterDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of a fighter card from the DataManager
    Languages
    This class manages the reading/writing of a language.
    MenuText
    Class for storage of all text shown in the GUI, for purposes of i18n.
    ProfileDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of a profile from the DataManager
    SceneDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of a scene from the DataManager
    Settings
    Class used as a container for the game's settings, so that they can be loaded from a file.
    SoundManager
    Class for encapsulating the sound management within the application.
    TrapDAO
    This class manages the interpretation of a trap card from the DataManager

Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data Description

The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage. It records and reads entities and resources from files.
